item.title: About
item.description: Hey, my name is Donatas, but I go by the nickname “Tronikel” on most websites I am a 17 year old from Lithuania that loves everything around web development Writing code for 3 years and counting Education I have completed the Harvard’s CS50 course I am currently in the senior year of high school ðŸ˜° What I like Open Source, I believe that truly secure & fast software can only be open source Customization, I love customizing linux (KDE) & will always choose fancy color palettes for my apps Typescript, The intellisense it gives you is just wow React, react sometimes gets a lot of hate, but with react 18 and new features like Suspense for data fetching and concurrency, I am truly glad I chose this framework Node, it’s faster than I initially thought MongoDB, The stuff you can do with aggregation is literally infinite Redis, caching data just seems so oddly satisfying to me, those <50ms response times Fastify, the express killer ?
